PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-03932010-03-25INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActTextile Labelling Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Textile Labelling and Advertising Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TEXTILE LABELLING AND ADVERTISING REGULATIONS to provide for the addition of two new generic fibre names (lastol and PLA) to allow manufacturers to use the new fibre names on the labels of consumer textile articles.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0073 Publication Date: 2010-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Textile Labelling and Advertising Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the TEXTILE LABELLING AND ADVERTISING REGULATIONS to provide for the addition of two new generic fibre names (lastol and PLA) to allow manufacturers to use the new fibre names on the labels of consumer textile articles.
